headline: Boston Properties (BXP) Q4 FFO and Revenues Lag Estimates
summary: Boston Properties (BXP) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of -13.52% and -0.68%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Boston Properties: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: BOSTON (AP) â€” Boston Properties Inc. (BXP) on Tuesday reported a key measure of profitability in its fourth quarter.  The Boston-based real estate investment trust said it had funds from operations of $280.2 million, or $1.76 per share, in the period.  The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $1.80 per share.

headline: BXP Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
summary: BOSTON, January 27, 2026--BXP, Inc. (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, reported results today for the fourth quarter and year ended December 31, 2025.

headline: Is Boston Properties (BXP) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether BXP at around US$64.77 is a bargain or a value trap, you are in the right place to size up what the market price is actually giving you.
